Talk_1012:
...


I take it you have encountered
my brethren.

Stay a moment...
Talk_1000:
You who stand before me...


Make an offering...


Offer <clr:0000>Poes<clr:ffff> to me...spirits that ought to
return to the afterlife.

They are pitiful beings who have lost
their way home and wander this land.

I am one who returns all Poes to the
afterlife without prejudice...

Good... Evil... That's the futile perspective
of narrow-minded beings... There is no
such distinction in wandering spirits...
Talk_1013: Seek my brethren in this land...
Talk_1014:
If you do so, you may receive
further blessings.
Talk_1002:
My brethren and I have combined our
power to create the <clr:0000>tunic of the Depths<clr:ffff>.
Talk_1003:
My brethren and I have combined our
power to create the <clr:0000>dark trousers<clr:ffff>.
Talk_1004:
My brethren and I have combined our
power to create the <clr:0000>gaiters of the Depths<clr:ffff>.
Talk_1005:
My brethren and I have combined our
power to create the <clr:0000>dark hood<clr:ffff>.
Com_Talk_07: Alas, I cannot give that to you now...
Talk_1006:
My brethren and I have combined our
power to create the <clr:0000>hood of the Depths<clr:ffff>.
Com_Talk_08: You do not have enough Poes to offer...
Talk_1007:
My brethren and I have combined our
power to create the <clr:0000>Tunic of Memories<clr:ffff>.
Com_Talk_09: It seems you cannot carry anything more.
Talk_1008:
If you desire it, you must make a
suitable offering.
Talk_1009:
You who stand before me... Offer <clr:0000>Poes<clr:ffff>
so as to return them to the afterlife.
Com_Talk_36:
I have no more items to offer you.


Others may also be seeking spirits. If you
are going to travel this land, you ought to
visit my brethren...
Com_Talk_11:
I have returned the lost spirits to the
afterlife.
Com_Talk_37:
I no longer have anything to offer you.


Others may also be seeking spirits. If you
are going to travel this land, you ought to
visit my brethren...
Talk_1011:
Visit me again when you have an
abundance of wandering spirits.
